Title: Episode #2.3
Writer: Dennis Kelly (creator), Dennis Kelly, John Donnelly, Huw Kennair-Jones (original idea), Mark Aldridge (original idea), Clare McDonald (original idea)
Actors: Adeel Akhtar, Paul Higgins, Geraldine James, Neil Maskell
Plot: The gang are on the run and find a precocious young hacker, who uncovers the key to The Network's new plan: a real global outbreak of weaponised Russian flu that will prompt the entire world to take up their vaccine on V Day.
